About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Learn more about our history, vision, and the heart of our church
About.para1: Iglesia Puertas Abiertas began in 2010 with a small group of believers passionate about sharing Christ's love. Over the years, we've grown into a vibrant community dedicated to serving God and our community.
About.para2: Our mission is to be a church that reflects God's unconditional love, where every person can find hope, purpose, and a spiritual family to accompany them on their walk with Christ.
About.missionDesc: To share the gospel of Jesus Christ and make disciples who transform lives and communities.
About.visionDesc: To be a church that impacts our city and the world with the love and truth of Christ.
About.valuesDesc: Faith, love, service, community, and excellence in everything we do for God's glory.
